EmailTemplate.description: CPQ-LC-10125 To Notify notifiers that proposal has been submitted for approval.
EmailTemplate.name: CPQ Dynamic Approval Notifier Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Workflow_Email_Record__c.Email_Subject__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear All, Please be notified that Approval Request has been submitted for below Proposal Record. {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Link} Thanks. {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.OwnerFullName}
